name: Invaders (itch) (Dalmanski GD)
description:
Invaders, A Multidirectional Shooter Game.

This game is made on Scratch. Then Export it on TurboWarp.

You can play this game through my link down below.

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/792604479/

Also, it is now released in Newgrounds:

https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/873061

Game description:

In space, where anyone wants to kill you by invading. They are called Invaders or enemies. Your duty is to kill them but first, you can move around by moving your mouse and clicking the left or right mouse to shoot. You can't spam clicking because it has reloaded. So, if you want to know more about this game, press the Pause button or P and then click the Help button or H to learn How to Play. All I want to say is to survive this game because it has an unlimited wave and whoever who's the highest wave score will be in the leaderboard if he/she has a Scratch Account.

If you have any concerns about this game, feel free to comment if you have any feedback or suggestions. And also, I want to test my Leaderboard System to see if it works. Update: 01/26/23:

> Added a username input if he/she has not logged in to his/her scratch account.

02/04/23:

> You can now play this in Touchscreen mode, I add the joystick and shoot button.

> You can next/go back to the help page.

> You can adjust the sensitivity in Option.

WIP (Work in Progress):

~ Still trying to fix the layering.

~ Tbh, it's too hard to play on Touchscreen, I'll fix this soon.

~ To detect automatically if you are playing on Computer or Touchscreen.
